nodes.text: The HyperMatter Tower was an administrative tower located in the Black Hole, a hypermatter refinery on the planet Corellia. The tower also contained the region's primary refinery, and during the Galactic War, the corrupt politician Harmon Torvix seized control of the Black Hole using the tower as his base.
The HyperMatter Tower was added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic in Game Update 1.1 along with the rest of the Black Hole.
